results.title: Change of renal function after short-term use of cardioprotective agents in patients with type 2 diabetes is not accurately assessed by the change of estimated glomerular filtration rate: an observational study
results.text_hl: In each @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@, we measured GFR (mGFR) by applying the constant infusion input clearance technique with sinistrin (Inutest; Fresenius, Linz, Austria) at baseline and after short-term (4-12 weeks) pharmacological intervention with cardioprotective agents (@CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Linagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069476 @@@linagliptin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@) that potentially lead to an alteration of renal @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@function@@@.

citations.NLM: Kolwelter J, Striepe K, Bosch A, Kannenkeril D, Ott C, Schiffer M, Schmieder RE. Change of renal function after short-term use of cardioprotective agents in patients with type 2 diabetes is not accurately assessed by the change of estimated glomerular filtration rate: an observational study Diabetol Metab Syndr. 2022 Jul 21;14(1):102. PMID: 35864523

results.title: Effect of Combination l-Citrulline and Metformin Treatment on Motor Function in Patients With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
results.text_hl: Children in the treatment group received 2500 mg of @CHEMICAL_Citrulline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002956 @@@l-citrulline@@@ (via powder in sachets dissolved in @CHEMICAL_Water @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014867 @@@water@@@) and 250 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (via @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@ tablets).

results.title: Physiologically Based Pharmacokinetic Modelling and Prediction of Metformin Pharmacokinetics in Renal/Hepatic-Impaired Young Adults and Elderly Populations.
results.text_hl: The predicted pharmacokinetic parameters, including maximum concentration, area under the time-concentration curve, and apparent oral clearance values, were within 1.5-fold of the observed data of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. In the simulation results, the systemic exposure of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was expected to be markedly increased not only with a decrease in renal @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@function@@@ but also with severe @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@hepatic impairments@@@.

citations.NLM: Rhee SJ, Chung H, Yi S, Yu KS, Chung JY. Physiologically Based Pharmacokinetic Modelling and Prediction of Metformin Pharmacokinetics in Renal/Hepatic-Impaired Young Adults and Elderly Populations. Eur J Drug Metab Pharmacokinet. 2017 Dec;42(6):973-980. PMID: 28536774

results.title: Treatment with l-citrulline and metformin in Duchenne muscular dystrophy: study protocol for a single-centre, randomised, placebo-controlled trial
results.text_hl: The aim of this study is to test if a 6-month treatment of a combination of @CHEMICAL_Citrulline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002956 @@@l-citrulline@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is more effective than placebo in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@loss of motor function@@@ and @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@muscle degeneration@@@ in @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@.
